page.title: 03THE SAMPFORDS RIVER
page.content: The River Pant starts in{Sewards End and flows out to the sea at{Maldon.} The{Great Sampford Outfall}is the second from last in a line of outfalls and pumping stations.It starts at the {Blackdyke intake.}Then it goes 20 km of Tunnels to the{Kennett Pumping {Station.}14.3 km of pipeline further is the{Kirtling Green Outfall.}Go 2.7 km of channel then another 13.7 km of River and you will find the{Wixoe {Pumping Station.}Going another 6.3 km of pipeline is the{Lakehouse Balancing {Tank.}After another 4km of pipeline you come to the{Great Sampford Outfall and last of all go 48 km of River then go 14.5 km of pipeline is the{ {Hanningfield Reservoir.}At the{Great {Sampford Outfall}the water flows by gravity from the Balancing Tank to the Outfall on the River pant.
